WorkItem.Description:
All really minor, you guys have done amazing things with this simulator.
Â 
1.  Glyph tabs have no tooltips, and sometimes tips from other tabs bleed through.  Certain hotspots (e.g. right after Glyph of Arcane Blast:) will sometimes give the tip of "Optimize between mage and molten armor".
2.  I could be missing it, but is there a way to account for the critical strike chance in Loatheb (50% increase for X% of the fight?).
3.  Minor trinket problems.  I can't get Thunder Capacitor to load, or "fix" the stats on Meteorite Whetstone (rawr says it has a 111 haste rating, and this disagrees with wowhead).

Comments.Message: On the trinket, it's because Rawr calculates what it's equvalient to when it's a proc item :)
All the problems should be fixed except Meteorite Whetstone. That right now is averaged by melee models and until they change it to a proper proc I don't see a way to hide it from mage model only.
